snippet: A "Christmas thought" posted on an Israeli Embassy Facebook page on Monday said that if Jesus lived in the modern world he would "probably end up being lynched in Bethlehem by hostile Palestinians."
abstract: A "Christmas thought" posted on an Israeli Embassy Facebook page on Monday said that if Jesus lived in the modern world he would "probably end up being lynched in Bethlehem by hostile Palestinians."

headline.main: Israeli Embassy Deletes 'Christmas Thought' Attacking Palestinians From Facebook
